!![[PopupTagger Plugin|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/readme]]
This ''PopupTagger'' plugin provides ''~TagTable'' and ''~TagBar with popup list of tags'' for [[TiddlyWiki 5|http://tiddlywiki.com/]].

** Inspired by [[MonkeyTaggerMacro|http://tiddlywiki.squize.org/#MonkeyTaggerMacro]] (~TiddlyWiki classic)

!!!Features # ''~TagBar'' with ''popup list of tags'' # ''~TagTable'' for quick tagging # ''~TagEdit'' enables ''tag editing'' as in ~TiddlyWiki classic # Shortcut <$button class=<>> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} for ''~PopupTagger'' setting # ''Global switch'' `<>` <> # ''Handy setup process'' -- central [[ControlPage|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage]] #* Each element can be enabled / disabled #* ''Custom parent tags'' to generate ''~TagBar'' and ''~TagTable'' #* ~PopupTagger could be ''selectively available'' for certain tiddlers only -- thanks to `<$list>` filter #* ''Custom ~PopupTagger location'' -- thanks to `list-after` field # ** all above tag operations is ''real-time'' in ''View Mode'' !!!Install * Drag&Drop package -- [[$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger]] (with documentation) !!!Usage * You may start with some tag trees like : <<< {{$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/img/tag-tree.png}} <<< # Goto central [[ControlPage|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage]] ( [[$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage]] ) # Check for available ~PopupTagger, or # Press `Add` button #* Rename the new ~PopupTagger tiddler, in order not to overwrite the [[PopupTagger template|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/TagBar]] #* ~~Modify `\define pptg-tool-base()` macro definition to sync with the new title~~ #* ~~In addition to that,~~ please keep `<>` macro call there. # Follow the `Configure` section provided in [[ControlPage|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage]] # ''Global switch'' `<>` <> is available in [[ControlPage|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage]], and can be added to else where as you like. * ** If you like to conduct a ''manual setup'', you may try `<>` or `<>` macro call, instead of `<>` !!!Filter Example |

[tag[`$:/_readme`]] [tag[`$:/_UI`]]

|tagged `$:/_readme` or `$:/_UI` | |

[tag[`$:/_macros`]tag[`$:/_popuptagger`]]

|tagged `$:/_macros` and `$:/_popuptagger` | |

[creator/`eucaly`/(i)]

|with creator name contains `eucaly` |
